segment.target: You start seeking traces of Mush... Pre-fungal level {quantity, select, 0 {nul} other {{quantity}}}.
**{character}** primes the machine. In a fit of crashing and banging, the mechanics kick in, the cogs grind and the aromas fill the room. It smells like a warm morning on a terrace on Venus. Coffee!
**{character}** hits up the dispenser with a strange glow in their eyes.
:mush: You have absorbed a spore to reinvigorate yourself.
**{character}** takes a pill.
You eat this pathetic morsel to pull the wool over their eyes, but it doesn't give you any energy...
**{character}** cooked a little something for later on.
This thing isn't as badly made as you thought... you can't seem to manage to dismantle it...
**{character}** has dismantled the **{target_equipment}**.
**{character}** and **{target_character}** killed the lights and then the strange noises started... A few minutes later, the lights went back on. They seemed in great spirits afterwards.

**{character}** and **{target_character}** killed the lights and then the strange noises started... A few minutes later, the lights went back on. They seemed in great spirits afterwards. *The sofa can't say the same...*.
**{character}** put something in the microwave.
:mush: **{character}** has removed a spore. It's truly repulsive. And the smell...
**{character}** wakes up calmly...
**{character}** has hidden a **{target_equipment}**.
You have successfully hyperfrozen and repacked the food.
**{character}** is lying down... It's good to just stop and take a break. Destination : the land of dreams!
**{character}** entered the room{is_tracker, select, true { {enter_loc_prep} {place}} other {}}.
**{character}** left the room{is_tracker, select, true { {exit_loc_prep} {place}} other {}}.
**{character}** starts reading enthusiastically...
**{character}** starts reading enthusiastically...
{content}
**{character}** has discovered a hidden **{equipment}**.
You have found nothing.
You wash yourself slowly under the shower, enjoying this rare moment of serenity...
While washing you feel yourself burning, like the water is slowly killing you... What you wouldn't do to switch places with one of them...
You wash yourself painfully, wondering if dismantling the showers was a good idea...
While washing you feel yourself burning, like the water is slowly killing you... What you wouldn't do to switch places with one of them...
**{character}** has picked up the **{target_equipment}**.
What a relief, **{character}** has successfully created a crossbreed of the **{target_equipment}**. The little plant is doing great!

What a relief... oh wait... **{character}** has not succeeded in their attempt to crossbreed a **{target_equipment}**. The little plant didn't grow and eventually died... Something must have contaminated the procedure.

You take a moment to wonder about the ventilation in the room as you apply the pink MT brand fungosecticide to your dear plant. After all it was used as successful biological and chemical warfare agent, but hey, the future of humankind is at stake.
You water the plants lovingly.
Pscchhhht... And there we go, a little extra oxygen!
**{character}** has removed a fuel capsule from the tank.
Strange, **{character}** is busying around their **{target_equipment}** which is giving off smoke...
Your sabotage attempt failed... it's trickier than it seems.
:fires: **{character}** put out the fire!
You failed to extinguish the fire...
**{character}** comforts **{target_character}**, it'll be better tomorrow, just you wait and see...
**{character}** has healed {quantity} :hp: for **{target_character}**.
You have healed yourself and in doing so, have restored {quantity} :hp:.
**{character}** is surrounded by a glowing halo. Horrible iridescent blue tentacles run along their body. The light they emit is blinding. Their wounds are perfectly healed!
**{character}**'s attempt to repair the hull has succeeded. It was high time that somebody took care of that...
Your attempt failed.
:mush: Well... it's getting hot in here... **{character}** has set fire to the room...
**{character}** installed their little **Camera** with care.
**{character}** has removed the **Camera**. It couldn't have been of any further use.
**{character}** is trying to resolve the infernal kube.
You use your extractor on this wretched boil. The noise is somewhat terrifying as is the amount of blood... Hang on, what the hell is that?
You use your extractor on this wretched boil. The noise is somewhat terrifying as is the amount of blood... Fortunately there is no spore there to recover.

Everyone looks focused on the small screen. Blouzorg appears on the screen, he looks proud and you can't understand anything he says. But it doesn't matter! [...] You applaud when Blouzorg beats his mother-in-law [...]. Who would have thought that Blouzorg and his space dog could danse the jerk! [...] Will Blouzorg marry Blourka? [...] The lights go out. These alien series are really incredible...
:mush: **{character}** blows on **{target_character}** a strange cloud...
The operation seems to last forever, **{character}** suffers a septic shock...
**{character}** gagged **{target_character}**.
:mush: **{character}** approached **{target_character}** and appeared to slip something into their walkie-talkie...
A piece of tape here, a weld there... and to think that this is all it takes to have a state-of-the-art iTrackie¬Æ¬©. All that's left to do is install the updates.
**{character}** shots directly at **{target_character}**'s head which rolls on the ground.
Dammit - lost again, it's unreal - this bloody machine almost killed you to boot!
OH YEEAAHH. **{character}** has defeated Xatator, the boss on LEVEL 10!
:hunter: Yes! **{character}** hit a *Hunter*.
You missed your target.
**{character}** has accessed the **{target_equipment}**.
**{character}** has just taken off.
**{character}**'s patrol ship has just landed.
:hunter: Nearly there! **{character}** hit a Hunter.
You missed your target.
The **{character}**'s attempt to repair the *{target_equipment}* was successful. Youhou! It's as good as new!
Your attempt failed.
The combustion chamber is currently at level: {quantity}
The combustion chamber is currently at level: {quantity}
You wipe the crap off the dial to read the contents of the chamber: {quantity}.
You have made it into the system!
It's impossible to crack this system...
**{character}** is getting the voyage underway. Their excitement is visible, and their zeal is palpable. The game is afoot!

**{character}** is getting the voyage underway. Their excitement is visible and their zeal palpable. But... but... no rumbling, no crashing or banging, in fact, no noise at all... The engines have broken down!
**{character}** is getting the voyage underway. Their excitement is visible, and their zeal is palpable. But the engines die immediately. This ship has not moved. There was no fuel.

**{character}** is getting the voyage underway. Their excitement is visible, and their zeal is palpable. But... But... The engines push, but nothing happens... An Arack prevents departure with its gravitational field!
You carried out a thermal scan and discovered a planet.
Your scan attempt failed.
**{character}** has carried out an analysis of {target_planet}.
You have removed a planet from your workspace.
**{character}** has launched {target_equipment} to the planet.
**{character}** landed {target_equipment} on the planet.
You have changed one of NERON's parameters.
**{character}** has advanced the PILGRED repairs.
:mush: Looking like the most normal thing in the world, **{character}** seemed to slip something into the shelving unit.
**{character}** and **{target_character}** are chatting innocently...
What a relief, **{character}** has successfully created a crossbreed of **{equipment}**. The little plant is doing great!

What a relief... oh wait... **{character}** has not succeeded in their attempt to crossbreed {equipment_first_letter, select, vowel {an **{equipment}**} other {a **{equipment}**}}. The little plant didn't grow and eventually died... Something must have contaminated the procedure.
**{character}** has called a ceasefire in the room. How authoritative!
:guardian: **{character}** has put **{target_character}** through the door. It's like The Shining in here, get a cleanup crew over here!
**{character}** suddenly got all serious-looking and started guarding the room...
**{character}** is going through an argument with NERON. Who knows what they can scheme about...
:mush: **{character}** approaches **{target_character}** furtively. After moving away again, **{target_character}**'s mood seems to drop rapidly...
:mush: In a flash, **{character}** taps **{target_character}** affectionately, but it seems as though some kind of putrid smoke came out of their fingers!

mush: **{character}** ejected some wretched slime onto {target_equipment_first_letter, select, vowel {an} other {a}} **{target_equipment}**. It'll break down in {quantity, select, 1 {1 cycle} other {{quantity} cycles}}...
**{character}** suddenly stiffens... It looks like twisted yellow threads are escaping from their spacesuit and trying to penetrate the hull...

**{character}** has been beavering away over what looked like the beginnings of a mini cathedral near {target_equipment_first_letter, select, vowel {an} other {a}} **{target_equipment}**... OK, it looks more like they reinforced the area with a dead armadillo but hey, who's caring, it should do the job.
You retreat proudly... bla bla... ah... never mind... your attempt at armor plating failed.
**{character}** attempts a daring loop to catch a piece of scrap in midair, but collects nothing...
**{character}** has been hammering away at this poor {target_drone}. It's for the best though. {target_drone} has been upgraded to **Turbo**.
**{character}** has been hammering away at this poor {target_drone}. It's for the best though. {target_drone} has been upgraded to **Fireman**.
**{character}** has been hammering away at this poor {target_drone}. It's for the best though. {target_drone} has been upgraded to **Pilot**.
**{character}** has picked up **{target_equipment}**.
**{character}** gave **{target_equipment}** a big cuddle, much to his displeasure, but in any case it always makes people feel better.
Premeditated or not, **{character}** took out their weapon and opened fire on **{target_equipment}**.
Premeditated or not, **{character}** took out their weapon and opened fire on **{target_equipment}**.
**{character}** pulls **{target_character}** into a corner and starts yelling at them...
You turn all these useless machines upside down and inside out, but there's really nothing interesting there...
Strange, **{character}** is busying around their **Door** which is giving off smoke...

:mush: **{character}** is getting closer to **{target_character}**... After {character_gender, select, female {that she moved away} other {that he moved away}}, this one seems to have a tormented sleep...
:mush: **{character}** seems to be deep in conversation with... NERON. But what on earth could this two have to talk about?
Access to Xyloph database denied. Nothing to show for it... Bloody coward admin.
Access to Xyloph database accepted. This disk contains crucial information on the Mush genome gathered by Ian Soulton just before the Daedalus left.

**{character}** worked at it to no avail, there was no way to triangulate the data... Suddenly a violent shudder causes a motherboard to fall on their head and their eyes light up. Eureka! You have to think outside the box! **{character}** then proceeds to discover the coordinates of the Edenists.
You work hard at it, but it's to no avail. There seems no way to triangulate the data...
**{character}** pours a delicious cup of **Coffee** from {character_gender, select, female {her} male {his} other {their}} Thermos... Mmh... It smells like a late night on a balcony on Saturn.
